taskDescription: The third and fourth steps in the synthesis of Hagemann’s ester from ethyl acetoacetate and formaldehyde (Problem 23-71) are an intramolecular aldol cyclization to yield a substituted cyclohexenone, and a decarboxylation reaction. Write both reactions, and show the products of each step.
